text.0:
The Enshell-Seijffers lab dissects intricate communication between the dermal papilla #mesenchyme and #hairfollicle #epithelia mediated by Fgf and #Wnt regulating the hair cycle clock.
#stemcells #epithelia @sarinashabso @BarIlanU
https://t.co/gEbKKiYrGt
text.1:
The Nerlov group find that #TGFbeta inhibition reverses #aging-associated #hematopoieticstemcell #platelet lineage biases, and increases #lymphoid progenitors. TGFbeta together with IL-6 inhibition improves #erythropoiesis.
#HSC #stemcells #hematopoiesis 
https://t.co/GP2Pn0t9lm
text.2:
The Seibold lab analyze airway transcriptome data from 695 children, identifying #eQTL for #ACE2 and #TMPRSS2 and show #TMPRSS2 expression is induced by #inflammation through IL-13 and #ACE2 by #interferon response to viruses 
https://t.co/fGOhBAPQZW
